1.1.2.1.8. shapepipe.pipeline.mpi_run module¶

shapepipe.pipeline.mpi_run.split_mpi_jobs(jobs, batch_size)[source]¶

Split MPI Jobs

Split the number of MPI jobs over the number of processes.

Parameters

  • jobs (list) – List of MPI jobs

  • batch_size (int) – Batch size

Returns

Split list of jobs

Return type

list

shapepipe.pipeline.mpi_run.submit_mpi_jobs(jobs, filehd, config, timeout, module, verbose)[source]¶

Submit MPI Jobs

This method distributes the jobs to the workers using MPI.
